snippet: The Joyce Theater’s spring and summer season, announced on Tuesday, also includes Dorrance Dance, the Stephen Petronio Company, Pennsylvania Ballet and a Cuba Festival.
abstract: The Joyce Theater’s spring and summer season, announced on Tuesday, also includes Dorrance Dance, the Stephen Petronio Company, Pennsylvania Ballet and a Cuba Festival.

headline.main: Miami City Ballet Returns for Joyce Season
headline.print_headline: Miami City Ballet Is Among Joyce Offerings
